participant_1.background:
I would not be able to work as a librarian if I were blind.
my mother was a single mother.
I can't seem to avoid tripping over my own feet.
I used to be more spontaneous with my painting.
I'm interested in learning about new driving techniques to improve my racing.

participant_2.background:
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I treasure my computer because it's how I make my music.
My most valuable possession is my intellect, which I plan to use to take over the world.
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
i ride my bike to class since its only a mile away.

content.text: Hi, I'm a librarian, I used to be more spontaneous with my painting but I'm interested in learning about new driving techniques to improve my racing. What are some things about you?

Hi, I love learning about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature. My most valuable possession is my intellect, which I plan to use to take over the world!
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be more knowledgeable about the universe, but I'm not sure where to start. What's your favorite thing to learn about?
I love learning about black holes! They're so fascinating and mysterious. I'm also interested in learning about the possibility of extraterrestrial life.
Me too! I think it's so cool to think about the possibility of there being life out there in the universe. Have you ever seen any UFOs?
No, I've never seen a UFO, but I've always been curious about them. I think it would be amazing to see one in person!
Me too! I wonder what they're really all about.
Maybe one day we'll find out!
